text: numbalage paramadhipatigen vu danduvama ha kopaya numbala veta patita viya. numbala ha numbalage mutun mittan evata nam tæbu namayan pilibanda numbala ma samanga vada karannehu da? eva pilibanda kisidu sadhakayak allah pahala nokaleya. ebævin numbala balaporottuven sitinu. sæbævinma mama da numbala samanga balaporottuvannan aturin vemi yæyi ohu pævasuveya
